item.title: Asgard
item.description: #planes #unvisited

item.title: Berufell
item.description: Notes City in East-Central [[Kingdom of Úlfurfold]] Ruled by [[Ren Stone]] [[Four Toes]] investigated the [[Mansion]] here, uncovering the plot of [[Assassination Attempt on Queen Freya Ulfur]] and leading to the escape of [[Lord Albrek]] Notable People [[Ren Stone]] - councilor [[Lord Albrek]], temporarily [[Toblin Stonehill]] - innkeeper Notable Locations [[Star Metal Mine]] [[Mansion]] Stores & Inns [[Wolf Steel Coster]] [[Stonehill Inn]] #cities

item.title: Bifrost
item.description: [[Asgard]]ian storytellers say rainbows represent the appearance of the Bifrost on Midgard. For this reason, the Bifrost is known as the Rainbow Bridge.

item.title: Black Sands Alliance
item.description: aliases: [‘BSA’] Description An independent alliance to the south of Viken, the Black Sands Alliance encompasses all of the

item.title: Boobles and Toobs
item.description: Notes Store owned by [[Oscar]] in [[Rond]] #stores #unvisited

item.title: Brekka Mountains
item.description: Notes Mountain range on the east side of the [[Myry Swamp]] [[Berufell]] resides in the mountains [[Drow - Species]] reside in the depths of the mountains probably #regions

item.title: Cragmaw Hideout
item.description: Notes Location on the way to [[Berufell]] from [[Ifyr]] [[Sildar]] was taken captive here to blackmail [[Lord Albrek]] #dungeons

item.title: Desolate Straits
item.description: Notes Region of ocean north of [[Kvikvik]] Need maps to cross [[Elyssa Engwyn|Elyssa]] tried to contract the [[Society of Crows]] to provide maps but they refused Currently very tempestuous #regions #unvisited

item.title: Eastern Edge Warehouse
item.description: Notes Warehouse we ended up burning down while attempting to fetch a payload for [[Pasha]] Owned by the [[The Myriad]] Contained a [[Baby Basilisk]] in it Package we were contracted to fetch here ended up being silver swords #dungeons

item.title: Ekaterina's Esoterica
item.description: Notes Magic Stored owned by [[Ekaterina]] in [[Ifyr]] #stores

item.title: Felderwin
item.description: Notes City in the [[Black Sands Alliance]] Notable People [[Helen Alderleaf]] #unvisited #cities

item.title: Feywild
item.description: Notes Realm of [[Fey]] creatures [[High Elves]] and [[Wood Elves]] originated here [[Shadowhand]] currently trapped here as of [[content/Session Notes/Viken Session 35]] Known Entrances Near [[Tel-Quessir]] #planes #unvisited

item.title: Forge of Spells
item.description: Notes Forge of magical items in the [[Star Metal Mine]] Probably where [[Luckbringer]] was created #unvisited #dungeons

item.title: Gullborg
item.description: Description Known colloquially as ʻThe Gold Cityʼ, Gullborg is the center of the Black Sands Alliance. A town of merchants, adventurers,

item.title: Hall of Echoes
item.description: Notes Cave at the base of the [[Oaken Heart]] Had a [[Hag]] living in it that revealed secrets about [[Fraeyda]] and [[Elyssa Engwyn]]’s pasts, including that she knew of the pact made between [[Selen Engwyn Sr.

item.title: Ifyr
item.description: Notes City in [[Kingdom of Úlfurfold]] Birthplace of [[Markus]] Notable People [[Ekaterina]] [[Sofia]] [[Markus]] Notable Organizations [[The Myriad]] Stores & Inns [[The Dusty Tome]] [[Ekaterina’s Esoterica]] [[Sootswallow Lodge]] #cities

item.title: Isilme
item.description: Notes School of magic in [[Tel-Quessir]] #schools #libraries

item.title: Jotunheim
item.description: #regions

item.title: Kingdom of Úlfurfold
item.description: aliases: [‘Úlfurfold’, ‘Ulfurfold’, ‘Kingdom of Ulfurfold’] Description For over five hundred years, human clans in varying states of organization have inhabited

item.title: Kvikvik
item.description: Notes City in the northwest of [[Viken]] and the [[Kingdom of Úlfurfold]] Ruled by [[Councilor Yorden Snow]] Notable People [[Councilor Yorden Snow]] [[Guildmaster Harold Royson|Guildmaster Royson]] [[Royson]] #cities #unvisited

item.title: Liat Peaks
item.description: Notes Mountains west of [[Faerun]] [[Drow - Species]] live under them #regions #untraveled

item.title: Lifewarden Spire
item.description: Notes One of the trees in [[Tel-Quessir]] Personal home of [[Keyleth Siannodel]]

item.title: Mansion
item.description: Notes in [[Berufell]] Contained a hideout for [[Lord Albrek]], [[Belmont]], and some other [[Dark Knights]] henchmen [[Nothic]] guarded part of it First real encounter between [[Lord Albrek]] and the [[Four Toes]] [[Lord Albrek]] ran from the encounter found [[Talon]] in a ravine underneath the mansion #dungeons

item.title: Midgard
item.description: The [[Midgard]], aka the mortal plane of existence. Many continents make up Midgard; our story is set on the continent of [[Viken]].

item.title: Miner's Exchange
item.description: Notes Store/guild in [[Berufell]] Encountered [[Halea]] here #stores #guilds

item.title: Myrkvior Woods
item.description: Notes Home of [[Bug]] #regions #unvisited

item.title: Myry Swamp
item.description: Notes Region in the center of [[Viken]] and the [[Kingdom of Úlfurfold]] Former and potential current home of [[Zaeygryn]], the blue dragon #regions #unvisited

item.title: Mystic Spire
item.description: Notes Top of the tallest tree in [[Tel-Quessir]] Place of governance [[Keyleth Siannodel]] and the [[Court of Stars]]

item.title: Natinal Library
item.description: Notes Library in [[Rond]] #libraries

item.title: Niflheim
item.description: The lowest of the three worlds in Asgardian cosmology, Niflheim is home to [[Hel]]. [[Hel]] is both the land of the dead and the name of the deity who rules it, and [[Hel]] can be found right at the border where Niflheim touches the [[Midgard]].

item.title: Oaken Heart
item.description: Notes One of the big trees in [[Tel-Quessir]]

item.title: Old Owl Well
item.description: Notes Has some strange activity near it, potentially a wizards tower Potentially also an entrance to the [[Star Metal Mine]]?

item.title: Port Baro
item.description: Notes City in Eastern [[Black Sands Alliance]] on the coast #cities

item.title: Rond
item.description: Description Capital City of Úlfurfold, in the central eastern part of the continent. This is where the King and Queen live.

item.title: Runes and Relics
item.description: Notes Magic store in [[Rond]] Owned by a Fire Genasi #stores

item.title: Savalier Woods
item.description: Description The Savaliere Woods lie to the far east of Viken. The elvish society has inhabited these woods for thousands of years, long before the Divergence

item.title: Skrvor
item.description: Notes City in the far northwest of [[Viken]] and the [[Kingdom of Úlfurfold]] launch point of [[Operation Frozen North]] #cities

item.title: Sootswallow Lodge
item.description: Notes Inn we accepted the job from [[Pasha]] at in [[Ifyr]] #inns #bars

item.title: Soultress Academy
item.description: Notes Academy for wizards in [[Rond]] [[Lord Albrek]] trained there #libraries #schools #wizard

item.title: Star Metal Mine
item.description: Notes Ancient abandoned mine system near [[Berufell]] Used to make magical weapons [[Dark Knights]] were seeking it, along with the [[Kingdom of Úlfurfold]] headed up by the government of [[Berufell]] There’s an entrance on [[Trigoat Trail]], but it is blocked and essentially impassable Once used to fashion a weapon for a god named [[Luckbringer]], as mentioned in [[content/Session Notes/Viken Session 11]] Per [[content/Session Notes/Viken Session 14]], there are four known entrances: Western entrance on [[Trigoat Trail]] #dungeons

item.title: Stonehill Inn
item.description: Notes Inn we stayed at while in [[Berufell]] #inns #bars

item.title: Tel-Quessir
item.description: Description The Elvish city of Tel-Quessir lies deep in the heart of the [[Savilere Woods]]. The elves have made their homes in the trees of the

item.title: Temple of the Fall
item.description: Notes Temple contains [[The Endless]] Kept by the [[Gatekeepers]] #dungeons

item.title: The Cock's Crow
item.description: Notes Inn in [[Rond]] I believe [[Bug]] invented [[Bug Bombs]] here #inns

item.title: The Dusty Tome
item.description: Notes Bookstore in [[Ifyr]] #stores

item.title: Trigoat Trail
item.description: Notes Trail we took to find the orcs we killed outside of [[Berufell]]

item.title: Valhalla
item.description: Valhalla is [[Odin]]’s vast hall in [[Asgard]]. It is home to all those slain in battle. Every day the rooster [[Gullinkambi]] (“Golden Comb”) wakes the fallen soldiers, and they venture out to fight each other in training for [[Ragnarok]], the final battle.

item.title: Viken
item.description: ![[Viken_Map.png]] History Humans arrived on Viken to a seemingly empty continent and founded the city of Kvikvik in about 20 P.

item.title: Wolf Steel Coster
item.description: Notes Store in [[Berufell]] #stores

item.title: Yggdrasil
item.description: A great ash tree also known as the World Tree, Yggdrasil’s branches wave above [[Asgard]]. Its three roots extend to each of the three planes of existence.
